mapper.insert: insert into sys_mould_info ( mould_name, mould_content, mould_type, apply_causes, mould_author, mould_state, cre_time, upd_time )values( #{mould_name}, #{mould_content}, #{mould_type}, #{apply_causes}, #{mould_author}, #{mould_state}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: select mould_type_id mould_type,mould_type_name mould_name from mould_type order by mould_type_id

select a.*,b.* from sys_mould_info a LEFT JOIN mould_type b on a.mould_type = b.mould_type_id
order by ${_sql_order}
